name: Raman Ramsin
content: Dr. Raman Ramsin's Homepage Home Department of Computer Science and Engineering Sharif University of Technology Azadi Avenue Tehran, Iran Contact Details Office: 611 Phone: (+9821) 66166620 Fax: (+9821) 66019246 E-Mail: <lastname> AT sharif DOT edu Raman Ramsin Associate Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Sharif University of Technology Created in September 2006âLast Updated: 4 October 2025 Methodology Engineering Lab Home Home | Teaching | Research | Publications | Other Educational Background - Ph.D. in Computer Science, University of York, United Kingdom - M.Sc. in Software Engineering, Sharif University of Technology, Tehran, Iran - B.Sc. in Computer Engineering (Software), University of Tehran, Iran Executive Positions - [2018 - 2020] Head of the Software Group, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Sharif University of Technology, Iran - [2010 - 2012] Head of the Software Group, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Sharif University of Technology, Iran - [2000 - 2001] Vice-Chairman for Education, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Sharif University of Technology, Iran Honors - Distinguished Lecturer, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Academic Year 2009-2010 - Distinguished Lecturer, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Academic Year 2000-2001 - Distinguished Lecturer, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Academic Year 1998-1999 General Research Interests - Object-Oriented Software Engineering - Methodology Engineering - Software Patterns and Pattern-Oriented Development Active Research Areas - Model-Driven Development (MDD) Methodologies - Knowledge Management Systems Development Methodologies - Agile Software Development Methodologies - Software Process Lines - Situational Method Engineering Weekly Schedule (in Persian): Fall ; Spring Research Laboratory: Methodology Engineering (ME) Lab Academic Group: Software Group Google Scholar Profile
